New Records: India registered their 11th straight win in T20Is
Key Match Events: Shreyas Iyer scored an unbeaten 74 off 44 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Shreyas Iyer continued to impress with his dazzling strokeplay
Miscellaneous Highlights: India claimed the series against Sri Lanka
The match was played on a chilly Saturday evening in Dharamsala
Others: Rohit Sharma got out for one in the final ball of the first over
Ishan Kishan got out to Lahiru Kumara for 16
Pathum Nissanka top-scored with a 53-ball 75 for Sri Lanka
